item.title: Exercises
item.description: In these exercises we will be working with these controllers, later we will working with Endpoints, since they are directly related to Services. Deployment Controller - Responsible for the controlled deployment of pods and ReplicaSets. ReplicaSets - is the newest version of the Replication Controller. The only difference between a ReplicaSet and a Replication Controller right now is the selector support. ReplicaSets Create the replicaset kubectl apply -f replicaset.yaml Get the status of the replicaset
